Ну, что сказать, классика. Игра суперская, если не играли то вам точно надо это сделать. 
Плюсы игры: 
1. Крутая графика, которая с годами не выглядит хуже.
2. Хороший сюжет, в файлах игры и в самой игре есть много пасхалок к истории игры.
3. Крайне необычная задумка с порталами, которая отлично открывается в геймплее.
Минусы игры:
1.Баги(такие как взять уитли на одном из начальных уровней, или смотреть на уитли через портал, когда он разбивает стекло)
2.Без интернета не смогло сохранить
Ну даже смотря на минусы, видишь, что их не так много, поэтому покупайте обязательно.

Easier to bhop. Better than the first one. Beatiful source graphics (i like the source graphics for some reason, csgo being superior still (personal preference)).
 It got even better than from the old xbox 360: workshop which always adds loads and loads of content.

[i]Come on its a cult classic what are you waiting for reading this shit[/i]
One of the best games i've ever played. alone, or with a friend. challenging, beautiful, insightful, simply a joy.
Tavsiye edilir
Muuten hyvä, mutten voi pelaa co-op- pelimuotoa, koska ei ole kavereita.

Игра хорошая в отличие от первой части.
В первой части была хуже графика и однообразные уровни (в отличие от последних уровней)
Во второй части добавили много фишек и деталей, улучшили графику и сделали геймплей интереснее, поэтому хочется проходить самому. Вторая часть лучше первой.

10 из 10 БАЛОВ ПО ВСЕМ ПАРАМЕТРАМ, СОВЕТУЮ ВСЕМ КУПИТЬ И ПОПРОБОВАТЬ. 
Легче сказать чего не хватает в игре:
1) Редактора персонажей в сетевой игре.
2) Почему в игре нет новых турелей (толстички)
3) Где мужской персонаж. И почему не раскрывается история девушки, кто она и откуда она, если клон, то где лаборатория по кланированию.

Portal seria je veľmy viborna prepracovani pribech a multiplayer a singleplayer z kamosem sa  smejeme jaky sme debili a nevieme to hrať pokial maš v hlave pilini tu hru nedohrajes dabing viborni pesnicky good proste dobra hra od valve ked pracuju na portal 3 tak to bude Super hra pokial to valve nedokurvi.

Best... game... ever...
Well until Portal 3 comes out. And then... 2nd best game ever. 

It's amazing how well Valve blends game play with entertainment in this game. It's like playing a game and watching a comedian at the same time, except the comedian is only there to mock you the whole time.
эта игра творение

Portal 2 is one of the all-time must play games. If you're on the fence about it at this point I don't know how my review might convince you. 

It's an enjoyable 3D puzzle game and this time there's the option to play with a friend. What's not to love for anyone who likes puzzle rooms.

Get a friend and play this gem. 


4/5, buy on sale.

Antes eu mal sabia mover um cubo e dependia do meu amigo (q acabou desistindo de mim e parou de jogar) para passar uma fase no co-op.

Hoje, com um PhD em física, eu dedico meu tempo de jogo para ensinar as batatas que eu chamo de amigos.






Eu finalmente entendo como é, Delta's Gas.

Puta joguinho complexo e bom, é muito divertido fazer com amigos pois os dois tem que ser cooperativos e pensarem juntos pra uma solução, além das mecanicas do game q podem ser utilizadas pra zuar tbm !
10/10 would recommend

两个人一起玩通关的，很有意思的解谜游戏，每天玩几关神清气爽。
It screwed my head sometimes but it was worth it. Portal 3 would be dope.
Bem parabéns valve pela segunda obra de arte de PORTAL SERIES

Portal 2 is an epic conclusion (or follow up?) to one of the finest puzzlers out there. More than it's predecessor, each puzzle is imbued with character and serves to deepen the lore and the characters. It hits you with a ton of new mechanics that though overwhelming at points, they still remain understandable and are a great joy to figure out. Most notable is how Valve manages to create such urgency within a puzzler. There are parts that literally see you scrambling and using some quick thinking which ads to the epic nature of this game.

In one word, disappointing. Its a puzzle game, that is repetitive, very easy and to long for the low variety of mechanics that offers. The characters are plain, and as the history, very predictable. Don't have any improve respect the first one. It's just not fun to play for along the 8 to 9 hours that you need to beet it.
Игра на любителя, но всё равно рекомендую.
Great Game
BENCE GÜZEL BİR OYUN AMA ÇOK SARMIYOR BE

Loved the game so much but kinda wish there were darksouls difficulty puzzles in the main game.

I didn't know if it'd be more fun than Portal 1, which I'd played a long time ago. But it is!

More world-building, more fleshing out of GlaDOS, and what feels like a longer game.

This is a total classic. You should play Portal 1 before Portal 2, as the game will feel more cohesive that way.

The game has aged well.

Valve basically took the first Portal game and upgraded everything. Bigger and better level design and more challenging puzzles with different features. Portal's beauty is in it's simplicity and it's done amazingly.
入选《人类都该玩一玩的十大游戏》。
Kozak

Portal 2 получилась отличным продолжением Portal и во всём превзошла первую часть серии. Процесс этой игры основан на прохождении тестовых камер с помощью устройства создания порталов. В игре есть всё: запутанный и трогательный сюжет,атмосферное музыкальное сопровождение,интересный дизайн.Также в ней присутствует большое количество юмора и пасхалок. В этой части было добавлено совместное прохождение тестовых камер и функция их создания,что даёт возможность вечного тестирования среды порталов.
Love the game to death. it has great co-op, and a challenging campaign! I EXTREMELY recommend this for $10! BUY IT!
Игра интересная, особенно очень захватывает финальная битва с босом (я прошел игру от А до Я) головоломки,сюжет,гемплей все это отлично сделано и доработано игру советую !

The game is good for those who love puzzle games, I didn't pay intention to the genre of the game when I bought it , I don't like puzzle games that much, I was going at a good pace , I didn't get frustrated or anything, but I don't enjoy puzzle games. 

If you like puzzle games then this is a good game for you , if you don't like puzzle games then you might not enjoy it.

One of the best from Valve, up there with Half-Life 2. It's bigger and arguably better than the original IMO!

Eu amo portal, meu sonho e ter uma continuação e ter uma parte 3 desse lindo jogo, porém sei que ele não terá pois a história já se encerrou. Eu vi uma coisa chamada ''Blue Sky'' onde aparentemente até mesmo o criador adorou a fanfic, então eu a considero como se fosse uma continuação sabe? Achei belo e muito criativo e bem feito, além de triste

ótimo jogo, recomendo muito para quem ama história e principalmente jogos de enigmas.
